title: P3D Ray Tracer
descriptionHTML: A ray tracer developed for the "3D Programming" course. It implements techniques such as nff models import, anti-aliasing, soft shadows, depth of field and acceleration by using an uniform grid.

title: Evolution of Fairness in Scale-free networks
descriptionHTML: A library developed to analyze the fairness in a Scale free network through the play of the Ultimatum game. Here, we explore how would poor and rich nodes behave when facing the different TAX models in the network.

title: Data integration
descriptionHTML: A project developed for data integration and analitics where, by using Pentaho softwares, we learned about data management, processing and integration processes, data warehousing, OLAP and ETL, data cleaning and others.

title: Question classification (NLP)
descriptionHTML: A project developed for natural language processing where a model to address the topic of question classification is being created.
